languages.text: "Ваше слово — закон, Лорд-капитан. Однако я не уверена, что новые рабочие заменят потерянную семью".

traits.locale_text: "Ваше слово — закон, Лорд-капитан. Однако я не уверена, что новые рабочие заменят потерянную семью".

languages.text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."
languages.original_text: "Ваше слово — закон, Лорд-капитан. Однако я не уверена, что новые рабочие заменят потерянную семью".

traits.locale_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still I doubt that new workers will substitute the lost family members."
"Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still I doubt that new workers will substitute the lost family members."
"Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."
"Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."
"Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

languages.text: “您的话就是法律，舰长大人。话虽如此，我担心新来的工人恐怕无法弥补那些失去的家庭成员。”
languages.original_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

traits.locale_text: “您的话就是法律，舰长大人。话虽如此，我担心新来的工人恐怕无法弥补那些失去的家庭成员。”

languages.text: «Su palabra es ley, Lord Capitán, pero dudo que tener trabajadores nuevos compense la pérdida de sus familiares».
languages.original_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

traits.locale_text: «Su palabra es ley, Lord Capitán, pero dudo que tener trabajadores nuevos compense la pérdida de sus familiares».

languages.text: "Euer Wort ist Gesetz, Lord Captain. Dennoch bezweifle ich, dass neue Arbeiter den Verlust von Familienmitgliedern wettmachen können."
languages.original_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

traits.locale_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

languages.text: « Votre parole fait loi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais je doute que de nouveaux travailleurs puissent remplacer des proches disparus... »
languages.original_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

traits.locale_text: « Votre parole fait loi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Mais je doute que de nouveaux travailleurs puissent remplacer des proches disparus... »

languages.text: 「あなたの言葉こそ法律です、ロード・キャプテン。しかし、新たな労働者がいなくなった家族の穴埋めになるでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言葉こそ法律です、ロード・キャプテン。しかし、新たな労働者がいなくなった家族の穴埋めになるでしょうか」

languages.text: "Emriniz bizim için kanundur Lord Kaptan ancak yeni işçilerin, kayıp aile fertlerinin yerini alabileceğinden şüpheliyim."
languages.original_text: "Your word is law, Lord Captain. Still, I doubt new workers will make up for lost family members."
